state_description: This screen allows users to perform various maintenance tasks to optimize their Mac's performance. Users can select tasks like freeing up RAM, purging space, flushing DNS cache, speeding up mail, reindexing Spotlight, repairing disk permissions, and thinning Time Machine snapshots.

enables.name: Free Up RAM
enables.description: Frees up unused memory to improve system performance.

enables.name: Free Up Purgeable Space
enables.description: Reclaims space that can be purged by the system.

enables.name: Flush DNS Cache
enables.description: Clears the DNS cache to resolve network issues.

enables.name: Speed Up Mail
enables.description: Optimizes the Mail app for better performance.

enables.name: Reindex Spotlight
enables.description: Rebuilds the Spotlight index to improve search performance.

enables.name: Repair Disk Permissions
enables.description: Fixes disk permission issues to ensure system stability.

enables.name: Time Machine Snapshot Thinning
enables.description: Reduces the size of Time Machine snapshots to free up space.
